content.raw: I just checked with the latest build - not sure why the models for the DRC_trials tasks aren't in the drcsim-3.0/gazebo_model/environments folder, which is where they belong.  For reasons I don't understand, they have been made a part of the gazebo_models repo, which is not an appropriate home for them.  I believe moving them over into the deb for DRCsim would be much more appropriate, and would resolve this issue.
